00305 
00306 void print_help()
00307 {
00308    puts("Available commands:\n");
00309    puts("addr <addr>                Set address");
00310    puts("debug 0/1                  Turn debuggin off/on on node (LCD output)");
00311    puts("echo [fc]                  Perform echo test [fast,continuous]");
00312    puts("flash                      Flash parameters into EEPROM");
00313    puts("gaddr <addr>               Set group address");
00314    puts("info                       Retrive node info");
00315    puts("load <file>                Load node variables");
00316    puts("ping <addr> [r]            Ping node and set address [repeat mode]");
00317    puts("read <index> [r]           Read node variable [repeat mode]");
00318    puts("reboot                     Reboot addressed node");
00319    puts("reset                      Reboot whole MSCB system");
00320    puts("sa <addr> <gaddr>          Set node and group address of addressed node");
00321    puts("save <file>                Save current node variables");
00322    puts("scan [r]                   Scan bus for nodes [repeat mode]");
00323    puts("sn <name>                  Set node name (up to 16 characters)");
00324    puts("terminal                   Enter teminal mode for SCS-210");
00325    puts("upload <hex-file> [debug]  Upload new firmware to node [with debug info]");
00326    puts("version                    Display version number");
00327    puts("write <index> <value> [r]  Write node variable");
00328 
00329    puts("");
00330 }

00333 
00334 void print_channel_str(int index, MSCB_INFO_VAR * info_chn, void *pdata, int verbose, char *line)
00335 {
00336    char str[80];
00337    int i, data;
00338 
00339    line[0] = 0;
00340    if (verbose) {
00341       memset(str, 0, sizeof(str));
00342       strncpy(str, info_chn->name, 8);
00343       for (i = strlen(str); i < 9; i++)
00344          str[i] = ' ';
00345       sprintf(line + strlen(line), "%3d: %s ", index, str);
00346    }
00347 
00348    if (info_chn->unit == UNIT_STRING) {
00349       memset(str, 0, sizeof(str));
00350       strncpy(str, pdata, info_chn->width);
00351       sprintf(line + strlen(line), "STR%02d    \"", info_chn->width);
00352       for(i=0 ; i<(int)strlen(str); i++)
00353          switch (str[i]) {
00354          case 1: strcat(line, "\\001"); break;
00355          case 2: strcat(line, "\\002"); break;
00356          case 9: strcat(line, "\\t"); break;
00357          case 10: strcat(line, "\\n"); break;
00358          case 13: strcat(line, "\\r"); break;
00359          default: line[strlen(line)+1] = 0; line[strlen(line)] = str[i]; break;
00360       }
00361       strcat(line, "\"");
00362    } else {
00363       data = *((int *) pdata);
00364       switch (info_chn->width) {
00365       case 0:
00366          printf(" 0bit");
00367          break;
00368 
00369       case 1:
00370          if (info_chn->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00371             sprintf(line + strlen(line), " 8bit S %15d (0x%02X/", (char) data, data);
00372          else
00373             sprintf(line + strlen(line), " 8bit U %15u (0x%02X/", data, data);
00374          for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00375             if (data & (0x80 >> i))
00376                sprintf(line + strlen(line), "1");
00377             else
00378                sprintf(line + strlen(line), "0");
00379          sprintf(line + strlen(line), ")");
00380          break;
00381 
00382       case 2:
00383          if (info_chn->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00384             sprintf(line + strlen(line), "16bit S %15d (0x%04X)", (short) data, data);
00385          else
00386             sprintf(line + strlen(line), "16bit U %15u (0x%04X)", data, data);
00387          break;
00388 
00389       case 3:
00390          if (info_chn->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00391             sprintf(line + strlen(line), "24bit S %15ld (0x%06X)", (long) data, data);
00392          else
00393             sprintf(line + strlen(line), "24bit U %15u (0x%06X)", data, data);
00394          break;
00395 
00396       case 4:
00397          if (info_chn->flags & MSCBF_FLOAT)
00398             sprintf(line + strlen(line), "32bit F %15.6lg", *((float *) &data));
00399          else {
00400             if (info_chn->flags & MSCBF_SIGNED)
00401                sprintf(line + strlen(line), "32bit S %15d (0x%08X)", data, data);
00402             else
00403                sprintf(line + strlen(line), "32bit U %15u (0x%08X)", data, data);
00404          }
00405          break;
00406       }
00407    }
00408 
00409    sprintf(line + strlen(line), " ");
00410 
00411    /* evaluate prfix */
00412    if (info_chn->prefix) {
00413       for (i = 0; prefix_table[i].id; i++)
00414          if (prefix_table[i].id == info_chn->prefix)
00415             break;
00416       if (prefix_table[i].id)
00417          sprintf(line + strlen(line), prefix_table[i].name);
00418    }
00419 
00420    /* evaluate unit */
00421    if (info_chn->unit && info_chn->unit != UNIT_STRING) {
00422       for (i = 0; unit_table[i].id; i++)
00423          if (unit_table[i].id == info_chn->unit)
00424             break;
00425       if (unit_table[i].id)
00426          sprintf(line + strlen(line), unit_table[i].name);
00427    }
00428 
00429    if (verbose)
00430       sprintf(line + strlen(line), "\n");
00431    else
00432       sprintf(line + strlen(line), "                    \r");
00433 }
00434 
00435 void print_channel(int index, MSCB_INFO_VAR * info_chn, void *pdata, int verbose)
00436 {
00437    char str[256];
00438 
00439    print_channel_str(index, info_chn, pdata, verbose, str);
00440    fputs(str, stdout);
00441 }

00443 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00444 
00445 int match(char *str, char *cmd)
00446 {
00447    int i;
00448 
00449    if (str[0] == '\r' || str[0] == '\n')
00450       return 0;
00451 
00452    for (i = 0; i < (int) strlen(str); i++) {
00453       if (toupper(str[i]) != toupper(cmd[i]) && str[i] != '\r' && str[i] != '\n')
00454          return 0;
00455    }
00456 
00457    return 1;
00458 }
00459 
00460 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00461 
00462 void cmd_loop(int fd, char *cmd, int adr)
00463 {
00464    int i, j, fh, status, size, nparam, addr, gaddr, current_addr, current_group,
00465       majv, minv;
00466    unsigned int data;
00467    unsigned char c;
00468    float value;
00469    char str[256], line[256], dbuf[100*1024];
00470    char param[10][100];
00471    char *pc, *p, *buffer;
00472    char name[256], chn_name[256][9];
00473    char lib[32], prot[32];
00474    FILE *f, *cmd_file = NULL;
00475    MSCB_INFO info;
00476    MSCB_INFO_VAR info_var;
00477    time_t start, now;
00478 
00479 
00480    /* open command file */
00481    if (cmd[0] == '@') {
00482       cmd_file = fopen(cmd + 1, "r");
00483       if (cmd_file == NULL) {
00484          printf("Command file %s not found.\n", cmd + 1);
00485          return;
00486       }
00487    }
00488 
00489    if (cmd[0])
00490       /* assumed some node correctly addressed in command mode */
00491       current_addr = 0;
00492    else
00493       current_addr = -1;
00494 
00495    current_group = -1;
00496 
00497    if (adr)
00498       current_addr = adr;
00499 
00500    do {
00501       /* print prompt */
00502       if (!cmd[0]) {
00503          if (current_addr >= 0)
00504             printf("node%d(0x%X)> ", current_addr, current_addr);
00505          else if (current_group >= 0)
00506             printf("group%d> ", current_group);
00507          else
00508             printf("> ");
00509          memset(line, 0, sizeof(line));
00510          fgets(line, sizeof(line), stdin);
00511       } else if (cmd[0] != '@')
00512          strcpy(line, cmd);
00513       else {
00514          memset(line, 0, sizeof(line));
00515          fgets(line, sizeof(line), cmd_file);
00516 
00517          if (line[0] == 0)
00518             break;
00519 
00520          /* cut off CR */
00521          while (strlen(line) > 0 && line[strlen(line) - 1] == '\n')
00522             line[strlen(line) - 1] = 0;
00523 
00524          if (line[0] == 0)
00525             continue;
00526       }
00527 
00528       /* analyze line */
00529       nparam = 0;
00530       pc = line;
00531       while (*pc == ' ')
00532          pc++;
00533 
00534       memset(param, 0, sizeof(param));
00535       do {
00536          if (*pc == '"') {
00537             pc++;
00538             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != '"'; i++)
00539                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
00540             if (*pc)
00541                pc++;
00542          } else if (*pc == '\'') {
00543             pc++;
00544             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != '\''; i++)
00545                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
00546             if (*pc)
00547                pc++;
00548          } else if (*pc == '`') {
00549             pc++;
00550             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != '`'; i++)
00551                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
00552             if (*pc)
00553                pc++;
00554          } else
00555             for (i = 0; *pc && *pc != ' '; i++)
00556                param[nparam][i] = *pc++;
00557          param[nparam][i] = 0;
00558          while (*pc == ' ' || *pc == '\r' || *pc == '\n')
00559             pc++;
00560          nparam++;
00561       } while (*pc);
00562 
00563       /* help ---------- */
00564       if ((param[0][0] == 'h' && param[0][1] == 'e') || param[0][0] == '?')
00565          print_help();
00566 
00567       /* version ---------- */
00568       else if (match(param[0], "version")) {
00569          mscb_get_version(lib, prot);
00570          printf("MSCB library version  : %s\n", lib);
00571          printf("MSCB protocol version : %s\n", prot);
00572       }
00573 
00574       /* scan ---------- */
00575       else if (match(param[0], "scan")) {
00576          do {
00577             /* decimal search */
00578             for (i = 0; i < 0x10000; i++) {
00579                printf("Test address %d    \r", i);
00580                fflush(stdout);
00581 
00582                status = mscb_ping(fd, i);
00583 
00584                if (status == MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00585                   status = mscb_info(fd, i, &info);
00586                   strncpy(str, info.node_name, sizeof(info.node_name));
00587                   str[16] = 0;
00588 
00589                   if (status == MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00590                      printf
00591                          ("Found node \"%s\", node addr. %d (0x%04X), group addr. %d (0x%04X)      \n",
00592                           str, i, i, info.group_address, info.group_address);
00593                   }
00594                } else if (status == MSCB_SUBM_ERROR) {
00595                   printf("Error: Submaster not responding\n");
00596                   break;
00597                }
00598 
00599                if (i && i % 1000 == 0 && status != MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00600                   i += 999;
00601                   if (i == 64999)
00602                      i = 0xFFFE;
00603                }
00604 
00605                if (i && i % 100 == 0 && status != MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00606                   i += 99;
00607                   if (i == 65499)
00608                      i = 0xFFFE;
00609                }
00610 
00611                if (kbhit())
00612                   break;
00613             }
00614 
00615             /* hexadecimal search */
00616             for (i = 0x100; i < 0x10000; i++) {
00617                printf("Test address 0x%x    \r", i);
00618                fflush(stdout);
00619 
00620                status = mscb_ping(fd, i);
00621 
00622                if (status == MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00623                   status = mscb_info(fd, i, &info);
00624                   strncpy(str, info.node_name, sizeof(info.node_name));
00625                   str[16] = 0;
00626 
00627                   if (status == MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00628                      printf
00629                          ("Found node \"%s\", node addr. %d (0x%04X), group addr. %d (0x%04X)      \n",
00630                           str, i, i, info.group_address, info.group_address);
00631                   }
00632                } else if (status == MSCB_SUBM_ERROR) {
00633                   printf("Error: Submaster not responding\n");
00634                   break;
00635                }
00636 
00637                if (i && (i & 0xFF) == 0 && status != MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00638                   i += 0xFF;
00639                }
00640 
00641                if (kbhit())
00642                   break;
00643             }
00644 
00645          } while (param[1][0] == 'r' && !kbhit());
00646 
00647          while (kbhit())
00648             getch();
00649 
00650          printf("                       \n");
00651       }
00652 
00653       /* info ---------- */
00654       else if (match(param[0], "info")) {
00655          if (current_addr < 0)
00656             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00657          else {
00658             status = mscb_info(fd, current_addr, &info);
00659             if (status == MSCB_CRC_ERROR)
00660                puts("CRC Error");
00661             else if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
00662                puts("No response from node");
00663             else {
00664                strncpy(str, info.node_name, sizeof(info.node_name));
00665                str[16] = 0;
00666                printf("Node name:        %s\n", str);
00667                printf("Node address:     %d (0x%X)\n", info.node_address, info.node_address);
00668                printf("Group address:    %d (0x%X)\n", info.group_address, info.group_address);
00669                printf("Protocol version: %d.%d\n", info.protocol_version / 16, info.protocol_version % 16);
00670                printf("Watchdog resets:  %d\n", info.watchdog_resets);
00671 
00672                printf("\nVariables:\n");
00673                for (i = 0; i < info.n_variables; i++) {
00674                   mscb_info_variable(fd, current_addr, i, &info_var);
00675                   size = info_var.width;
00676                   memset(dbuf, 0, sizeof(dbuf));
00677                   mscb_read(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) i, dbuf, &size);
00678 
00679                   print_channel(i, &info_var, dbuf, 1);
00680                }
00681 
00682                mscb_get_version(lib, prot);
00683                majv = atoi(prot);
00684                if (strchr(prot, '.'))
00685                   minv = atoi(strchr(prot, '.')+1);
00686                else
00687                   minv = 0;
00688                if (info.protocol_version / 16 != majv || info.protocol_version % 16 != minv) {
00689                   printf("\nWARNING: Protocol version on node (%d.%d) differs from local version (%s).\n",
00690                      info.protocol_version / 16, info.protocol_version % 16, prot);
00691                   printf("Problems may arise communicating with this node.\n\n");
00692                }
00693             }
00694          }
00695       }
00696 
00697       /* ping ---------- */
00698       else if (match(param[0], "ping")) {
00699          if (!param[1][0])
00700             puts("Please specify node address");
00701          else {
00702             if (param[1][1] == 'x')
00703                sscanf(param[1] + 2, "%x", &addr);
00704             else
00705                addr = atoi(param[1]);
00706 
00707             do {
00708                status = mscb_addr(fd, MCMD_PING16, addr, 1, 1);
00709                if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS) {
00710                   if (status == MSCB_MUTEX)
00711                      printf("MSCB used by other process\n");
00712                   else if (status == MSCB_SUBM_ERROR)
00713                      printf("Error: Submaster not responding\n");
00714                   else
00715                      printf("Node %d does not respond\n", addr);
00716                   current_addr = -1;
00717                   current_group = -1;
00718                } else {
00719                   printf("Node %d addressed\n", addr);
00720                   current_addr = addr;
00721                   current_group = -1;
00722                }
00723 
00724                if (param[2][0] == 'r' && !kbhit())
00725                   Sleep(1000);
00726 
00727             } while (param[2][0] == 'r' && !kbhit());
00728          }
00729       }
00730 
00731       /* address ---------- */
00732       else if (match(param[0], "addr")) {
00733          if (!param[1][0])
00734             puts("Please specify node address");
00735          else {
00736             if (param[1][1] == 'x')
00737                sscanf(param[1] + 2, "%x", &addr);
00738             else
00739                addr = atoi(param[1]);
00740 
00741             mscb_addr(fd, MCMD_ADDR_NODE16, addr, 1, 1);
00742             current_addr = addr;
00743             current_group = -1;
00744          }
00745       }
00746 
00747       /* ga, set group address ---------- */
00748       else if (match(param[0], "ga")) {
00749          if (!param[1][0])
00750             puts("Please specify node address");
00751          else {
00752             if (param[1][1] == 'x')
00753                sscanf(param[1] + 2, "%x", &addr);
00754             else
00755                addr = atoi(param[1]);
00756 
00757             current_addr = -1;
00758             current_group = addr;
00759          }
00760       }
00761 
00762       /* sa, set node address ---------- */
00763       else if (match(param[0], "sa")) {
00764          if (current_addr < 0)
00765             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00766          else {
00767             if (!param[1][0] || !param[2][0])
00768                puts("Please specify node and group address");
00769             else {
00770                if (param[1][1] == 'x')
00771                   sscanf(param[1] + 2, "%x", &addr);
00772                else
00773                   addr = atoi(param[1]);
00774 
00775                if (param[2][1] == 'x')
00776                   sscanf(param[2] + 2, "%x", &gaddr);
00777                else
00778                   gaddr = atoi(param[2]);
00779 
00780                status = mscb_set_addr(fd, current_addr, addr, gaddr);
00781                if (status == MSCB_ADDR_EXISTS)
00782                   printf("Error: Address %d exists already on this network\n", addr);
00783                else
00784                   current_addr = addr;
00785             }
00786          }
00787       }
00788 
00789       /* sn, set node name ---------- */
00790       else if (match(param[0], "sn")) {
00791          if (current_addr < 0)
00792             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00793          else {
00794             if (!param[1][0])
00795                puts("Please specify node name");
00796             else {
00797                strcpy(str, param[1]);
00798                while (strlen(str) > 0 && (str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\r' || str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n'))
00799                   str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
00800 
00801                mscb_set_name(fd, current_addr, str);
00802             }
00803          }
00804       }
00805 
00806       /* debug ---------- */
00807       else if (match(param[0], "debug")) {
00808          if (current_addr < 0)
00809             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00810          else {
00811             if (!param[1][0])
00812                puts("Please specify 0/1");
00813             else {
00814                i = atoi(param[1]);
00815 
00816                /* write CSR register */
00817                c = i ? CSR_DEBUG : 0;
00818                mscb_write(fd, current_addr, 0xFF, &c, 1);
00819             }
00820          }
00821       }
00822 
00823       /* write ---------- */
00824       else if (match(param[0], "write")) {
00825          if (current_addr < 0 && current_group < 0)
00826             printf("You must first address a node or a group\n");
00827          else {
00828             if (!param[1][0] || !param[2][0])
00829                puts("Please specify channel number and data");
00830             else {
00831                addr = atoi(param[1]);
00832 
00833                if (current_addr >= 0) {
00834                   mscb_info_variable(fd, current_addr, addr, &info_var);
00835 
00836                   if (info_var.unit == UNIT_STRING) {
00837                      memset(str, 0, sizeof(str));
00838                      strncpy(str, param[2], info_var.width);
00839                      if (strlen(str) > 0 && str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n')
00840                         str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
00841 
00842                      status = mscb_write(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) addr, str, strlen(str)+1);
00843                   } else {
00844                      if (info_var.flags & MSCBF_FLOAT) {
00845                         value = (float) atof(param[2]);
00846                         memcpy(&data, &value, sizeof(float));
00847                      } else {
00848                         if (param[2][1] == 'x')
00849                            sscanf(param[2] + 2, "%x", &data);
00850                         else
00851                            data = atoi(param[2]);
00852                      }
00853 
00854                      do {
00855 
00856                         status = mscb_write(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) addr, &data, info_var.width);
00857                         Sleep(100);
00858 
00859                      } while (param[3][0] && !kbhit());
00860 
00861                   }
00862                } else if (current_group >= 0) {
00863                   if (param[2][1] == 'x')
00864                      sscanf(param[2] + 2, "%x", &data);
00865                   else
00866                      data = atoi(param[2]);
00867 
00868                   status = mscb_write_group(fd, current_group, (unsigned char) addr, &data, 4);
00869                }
00870 
00871                if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
00872                   printf("Error: %d\n", status);
00873             }
00874          }
00875       }
00876 
00877       /* read ---------- */
00878       else if (match(param[0], "read")) {
00879          if (current_addr < 0)
00880             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00881          else {
00882             if (!param[1][0])
00883                puts("Please specify channel number");
00884             else {
00885                addr = atoi(param[1]);
00886 
00887                status = mscb_info_variable(fd, current_addr, addr, &info_var);
00888 
00889                if (status == MSCB_CRC_ERROR)
00890                   puts("CRC Error");
00891                else if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
00892                   puts("Timeout or invalid channel number");
00893                else {
00894                   do {
00895                      memset(dbuf, 0, sizeof(dbuf));
00896                      size = info_var.width;
00897                      status = mscb_read(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) addr, dbuf, &size);
00898                      if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
00899                         printf("Error: %d\n", status);
00900                      else if (size != info_var.width)
00901                         printf("Error: Received %d bytes instead of %d", size, info_var.width);
00902                      else
00903                         print_channel(addr, &info_var, dbuf, 0);
00904 
00905                      Sleep(10);
00906                   } while (param[2][0] && !kbhit());
00907 
00908                   while (kbhit())
00909                      getch();
00910 
00911                   printf("\n");
00912                }
00913             }
00914          }
00915       }
00916 
00917       /* save ---------- */
00918       else if (match(param[0], "save")) {
00919          if (current_addr < 0)
00920             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00921          else {
00922             if (param[1][0] == 0) {
00923                printf("Enter file name: ");
00924                fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00925             } else
00926                strcpy(str, param[1]);
00927 
00928             if (str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n')
00929                str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
00930 
00931             f = fopen(str, "wt");
00932             if (f == NULL) {
00933                printf("Cannot open file %s\n", str);
00934             } else {
00935                status = mscb_info(fd, current_addr, &info);
00936                if (status == MSCB_CRC_ERROR)
00937                   puts("CRC Error");
00938                else if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
00939                   puts("No response from node");
00940                else {
00941                   strncpy(str, info.node_name, sizeof(info.node_name));
00942                   str[16] = 0;
00943                   fprintf(f, "Node name:        %s\n", str);
00944                   fprintf(f, "Node address:     %d (0x%X)\n", info.node_address, info.node_address);
00945                   fprintf(f, "Group address:    %d (0x%X)\n", info.group_address, info.group_address);
00946                   fprintf(f, "Protocol version: %d.%d\n",
00947                           info.protocol_version / 16, info.protocol_version % 16);
00948                   fprintf(f, "Watchdog resets:  %d\n", info.watchdog_resets);
00949 
00950                   fprintf(f, "\nVariables:\n");
00951                   for (i = 0; i < info.n_variables; i++) {
00952                      mscb_info_variable(fd, current_addr, i, &info_var);
00953                      size = sizeof(data);
00954                      mscb_read(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) i, dbuf, &size);
00955 
00956                      print_channel_str(i, &info_var, dbuf, 1, str);
00957                      fprintf(f, str);
00958                   }
00959                }
00960 
00961                fclose(f);
00962             }
00963          }
00964       }
00965 
00966       /* load ---------- */
00967       else if (match(param[0], "load")) {
00968          if (current_addr < 0)
00969             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
00970          else {
00971             if (param[1][0] == 0) {
00972                printf("Enter file name: ");
00973                fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
00974             } else
00975                strcpy(str, param[1]);
00976 
00977             if (str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n')
00978                str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
00979 
00980             /* get list of channel names */
00981             status = mscb_info(fd, current_addr, &info);
00982             if (status == MSCB_CRC_ERROR)
00983                puts("CRC Error");
00984             else if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
00985                puts("No response from node");
00986             else {
00987                memset(chn_name, 0, sizeof(chn_name));
00988                for (i = 0; i < info.n_variables; i++) {
00989                   mscb_info_variable(fd, current_addr, i, &info_var);
00990                   strcpy(chn_name[i], info_var.name);
00991                }
00992 
00993                f = fopen(str, "rt");
00994                if (f) {
00995                   do {
00996                      line[0] = 0;
00997                      fgets(line, sizeof(line), f);
00998 
00999                      if (line[3] == ':' && line[4] == ' ') {
01000                         /* variable found, extract it */
01001                         for (i = 0; i < 8 && line[i + 5] != ' '; i++)
01002                            name[i] = line[i + 5];
01003                         name[i] = 0;
01004 
01005                         p = line + 23;
01006                         while (*p && *p == ' ')
01007                            p++;
01008 
01009                         /* search for channel with same name */
01010                         for (i = 0; chn_name[i][0]; i++)
01011                            if (strcmp(chn_name[i], name) == 0) {
01012                               mscb_info_variable(fd, current_addr, i, &info_var);
01013 
01014                               if (info_var.unit == UNIT_STRING) {
01015                                  memset(str, 0, sizeof(str));
01016                                  strncpy(str, p, info_var.width);
01017                                  if (strlen(str) > 0 && str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n')
01018                                     str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
01019 
01020                                  status =
01021                                      mscb_write(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) i, str, info_var.width);
01022                               } else {
01023                                  if (info_var.flags & MSCBF_FLOAT) {
01024                                     value = (float) atof(p);
01025                                     memcpy(&data, &value, sizeof(float));
01026                                  } else {
01027                                     data = atoi(p);
01028                                  }
01029 
01030                                  status =
01031                                      mscb_write(fd, current_addr, (unsigned char) i, &data, info_var.width);
01032 
01033                                  /* blank padding */
01034                                  for (j = strlen(name); j < 8; j++)
01035                                     name[j] = ' ';
01036                                  name[j] = 0;
01037 
01038                                  printf("%03d: %s %s", i, name, p);
01039                               }
01040 
01041                               break;
01042                            }
01043                      }
01044                   } while (!feof(f));
01045 
01046                   fclose(f);
01047                } else
01048                   printf("File \"%s\" not found\n", str);
01049             }
01050          }
01051       }
01052 
01053       /* terminal ---------- */
01054       else if (match(param[0], "terminal")) {
01055          int d, status;
01056 
01057          puts("Exit with <ESC>\n");
01058 
01059          /* switch SCS-210 into terminal mode */
01060          c = 0;
01061          status = mscb_write(fd, current_addr, 0, &c, 1);
01062 
01063          do {
01064             if (kbhit()) {
01065                c = getch();
01066                putchar(c);
01067                status = mscb_write(fd, current_addr, 0, &c, 1);
01068                if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS) {
01069                   printf("\nError: %d\n", status);
01070                   break;
01071                }
01072 
01073                if (c == '\r') {
01074                   putchar('\n');
01075                   c = '\n';
01076                   mscb_write(fd, current_addr, 0, &c, 1);
01077                }
01078 
01079             }
01080 
01081             size = sizeof(d);
01082             mscb_read(fd, current_addr, 0, &d, &size);
01083             if (d > 0)
01084                putchar(d);
01085 
01086             Sleep(10);
01087          } while (c != 27);
01088 
01089          puts("\n");
01090          while (kbhit())
01091             getch();
01092       }
01093 
01094       /* flash ---------- */
01095       else if (match(param[0], "flash")) {
01096          if (current_addr < 0)
01097             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
01098          else {
01099             status = mscb_flash(fd, current_addr);
01100 
01101             if (status != MSCB_SUCCESS)
01102                printf("Error: %d\n", status);
01103          }
01104       }
01105 
01106       /* upload ---------- */
01107       else if (match(param[0], "upload")) {
01108          if (current_addr < 0)
01109             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
01110          else {
01111             if (param[1][0] == 0) {
01112                printf("Enter name of HEX-file: ");
01113                fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);
01114             } else
01115                strcpy(str, param[1]);
01116 
01117             if (str[strlen(str) - 1] == '\n')
01118                str[strlen(str) - 1] = 0;
01119 
01120             fh = open(str, O_RDONLY | O_BINARY);
01121             if (fh > 0) {
01122                if (param[2][0])
01123                   printf("Found file %s\n", str);
01124                size = lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_END) + 1;
01125                lseek(fh, 0, SEEK_SET);
01126                buffer = malloc(size);
01127                memset(buffer, 0, size);
01128                read(fh, buffer, size - 1);
01129                close(fh);
01130                status = mscb_upload(fd, current_addr, buffer, size, param[2][0]);
01131                if (status == MSCB_FORMAT_ERROR)
01132                   printf("Syntax error in file \"%s\"\n", str);
01133                else if (status == MSCB_TIMEOUT)
01134                   printf("Node %d does not respond\n", current_addr);
01135 
01136                free(buffer);
01137             } else
01138                printf("File \"%s\" not found\n", str);
01139          }
01140       }
01141 
01142       /* reboot ---------- */
01143       else if (match(param[0], "reboot")) {
01144          mscb_reboot(fd, current_addr);
01145       }
01146 
01147       /* reset ---------- */
01148       else if (match(param[0], "reset")) {
01149          mscb_reset(fd);
01150       }
01151 
01152       /* echo test ---------- */
01153       else if (match(param[0], "echo")) {
01154          unsigned char d1, d2;
01155          int i, status;
01156 
01157          if (current_addr < 0)
01158             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
01159          else {
01160             d1 = i = 0;
01161             /* first echo with adressing */
01162             status = mscb_echo(fd, current_addr, d1, &d2);
01163             while (!kbhit()) {
01164                d1 = rand();
01165 
01166                /* following echos without adressing */
01167                status = mscb_echo(fd, 0, d1, &d2);
01168 
01169                if (d2 != d1) {
01170                   printf("%d\nReceived: %02X, should be %02X, status = %d\n", i, d2, d1, status);
01171 
01172                   if (param[1][0] != 'c' && param[1][1] != 'c')
01173                      break;
01174                }
01175 
01176                i++;
01177                if (i % 100 == 0) {
01178                   printf("%d\r", i);
01179                   fflush(stdout);
01180                }
01181 
01182                if (param[1][0] != 'f' && param[1][1] != 'c')
01183                   Sleep(10);
01184             }
01185             printf("%d\n", i);
01186             while (kbhit())
01187                getch();
01188          }
01189       }
01190 
01191       /* block transfer test ---------- */
01192       else if (match(param[0], "block")) {
01193          int i, status;
01194 
01195          if (current_addr < 0)
01196             printf("You must first address an individual node\n");
01197          else {
01198             i = 0;
01199             time(&start);
01200             while (!kbhit()) {
01201                status = mscb_write_block(fd, current_addr, 0, dbuf, 1024);
01202                i += 1024;
01203 
01204                time(&now);
01205                if (now > start+1) {
01206                   start = now;
01207                   printf("%4.2lf kB/sec\r", i/1024.0);
01208                   i = 0;
01209                   fflush(stdout);
01210                }
01211             }
01212             printf("%d\n", i);
01213             while (kbhit())
01214                getch();
01215          }
01216       }
01217 
01218       /* test1 ---------- */
01219       else if (match(param[0], "t1")) {
01220          data = atoi(param[1]);
01221          mscb_link(fd, current_addr, 8, &data, 4);
01222 
01223          printf("Data: %d\n", data);
01224       }
01225 
01226       /* exit/quit ---------- */
01227       else if (match(param[0], "exit") || match(param[0], "quit"))
01228          break;
01229 
01230       else if (param[0][0] == 0);
01231 
01232       else if (param[0][0] == '\n');
01233 
01234       else
01235          printf("Unknown command %s %s %s\n", param[0], param[1], param[2]);
01236 
01237       /* exit after single command */
01238       if (cmd[0] && cmd[0] != '@')
01239          break;
01240 
01241    } while (1);
01242 }
01243 
01244 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01245 
01246 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
01247 {
01248    int i, fd, adr, server;
01249    char cmd[256], device[256];
01250    int debug, check_io;
01251 
01252    cmd[0] = 0;
01253    adr = 0;
01254 
01255    debug = check_io = server = 0;
01256    device[0] = 0;
01257 
01258    /* parse command line parameters */
01259    for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
01260       if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'v')
01261          debug = 1;
01262       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'i')
01263          check_io = 1;
01264       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 's')
01265          server = 1;
01266       else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
01267          if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
01268             goto usage;
01269          else if (argv[i][1] == 'd')
01270             strcpy(device, argv[++i]);
01271          else if (argv[i][1] == 'a')
01272             adr = atoi(argv[++i]);
01273          else if (argv[i][1] == 'c') {
01274             if (strlen(argv[i]) >= 256) {
01275                printf("error: command line too long (>256).\n");
01276                return 0;
01277             }
01278             strcpy(cmd, argv[++i]);
01279          } else {
01280           usage:
01281             printf("usage: msc [-d host:device] [-a addr] [-c Command] [-c @CommandFile] [-v] [-i]\n\n");
01282             printf("       -d     device, usually \"%s\" for parallel port,\n", device);
01283             printf("              or 0x378 for direct parallel port address,\n");
01284             printf("              or \"<host>:%s\" for RPC connection\n", device);
01285             printf("       -s     Start RPC server\n");
01286             printf("       -a     Address node before executing command\n");
01287             printf("       -c     Execute command immediately\n");
01288             printf("       -v     Produce verbose debugging output\n\n");
01289             printf("       -i     Check IO pins of port\n\n");
01290             printf("For a list of valid commands start msc interactively\n");
01291             printf("and type \"help\".\n");
01292             return 0;
01293          }
01294       }
01295    }
01296 
01297    if (server) {
01298       mrpc_server_loop();
01299       return 0;
01300    }
01301 
01302    if (check_io) {
01303       mscb_check(device, sizeof(device));
01304       return 0;
01305    }
01306 
01307    /* open port */
01308    fd = mscb_init(device, sizeof(device), debug ? 1 : 0);
01309    if (fd < 0) {
01310       if (fd == -2) {
01311          printf("No MSCB submaster present at port \"%s\"\n", device);
01312 
01313          puts("\nMake sure that");
01314          puts("");
01315          puts("o The MSCB submaster is correctly connected to the parallel port");
01316          puts("o The MSCB submaster has power (green LED on)");
01317          puts("");
01318          puts("If this is a new installation, check in the PC BIOS that");
01319          puts("");
01320          puts("o LPT1 is in bi-directional (or EPP) mode, NOT ECP mode");
01321          puts("o LPT1 is configured to address 0x378 (hex)");
01322          puts("o If BIOS seems ok, you can check the pin I/O with a logic probe");
01323          puts("  and the \"msc -i\" command which toggles the pins of the parallel port");
01324          puts("o If the port is configured to another address than 0x378, use");
01325          puts("  \"msc -d 0xabc\" with \"0xabc\" the correct address");
01326       } else if (fd == -3) {
01327          printf("MSCB system locked by other process\n");
01328       } else if (fd == -4) {
01329          printf("\nCannot communicate with MSCB submaster at %s\n", device);
01330          puts("Please disconnect and reconnect submaster\n");
01331       } else if (fd == -5) {
01332          printf("\nNo write access to MSCB submaster at %s\n", device);
01333          puts("Please install hotplug script \"/etc/hotplug/usb/scs_250\".\n");
01334       } else
01335          if (device[0])
01336             printf("Cannot connect to device \"%s\"\n", device);\
01337          else
01338             printf("No MSCB submaster found\n");
01339 
01340 #ifdef _MSC_VER
01341       puts("\n-- hit any key to exit --");
01342 
01343       while (!kbhit()) 
01344          Sleep(100);
01345       while (kbhit())
01346          getch();
01347 #endif
01348 
01349       return 0;
01350    }
01351 
01352    printf("Connected to submaster at %s\n", device);
01353 
01354    cmd_loop(fd, cmd, adr);
01355 
01356    mscb_exit(fd);
01357 
01358    return 0;
01359 }
Generated on 6 Jun 2014 for AlcapDAQ:Rootana by  1.6.1
